duck: Public display of affection - Public displays of Affection are acts of physical intimacy in the view of others.
personal digital assistant - A personal digital assistant, also known as a palmtop computer, or personal data assistant, is a mobile device that functions as a personal information manager.
pda definition: a small hand-held device equipped with a microprocessor that is used especially for storing and organizing personal information (as addresses and schedules).

milestones: Citizen groups ask Congress to file formal "Resolution of Inquiry" against Bush
2007 Taipei Samsung Running Festival: A combination with charity, technology, and sports
2007 Intel Developer Forum Taipei Autumn starts with Mobility and Internet Experience
Apple may build cameras into Macs
New version of Opera web browser released
2008 Taiwan Excellence Gold and Silver Awards announced
2008 Taipei Computer Applications Show launched in Taipei World Trade Center
EU deems UK privacy laws inadequate, takes legal action
OpenSync Interview - syncing on the free desktop
Secret Downing Street Memo leaked

wiki.text:
A 'PDA' is most commonly a '[[Personal digital assistant]]', also known as a
Personal data assistant, a mobile electronic device.

'PDA' may also refer to:

In 'science', 'medicine' and 'technology':
* Patent ductus arteriosus, a heart defect
* Posterior descending artery, an alternative name for the posterior
  interventricular artery
* Photodiode array, a type of detector
* Polydiacetylenes, a family of conducting polymers
* Potato dextrose agar, a microbiological media for culturing yeast and fungus
* Pathological demand avoidance syndrome

In 'mathematics':
* Pitch detection algorithm, a mathematical method of finding the pitch
  of a signal
* Pushdown automaton, a type of abstract device in automata theory

In 'music':
* "PDA" (song), a song by Interpol
* "PDA", a song by the Backstreet Boys from [[This Is Us (Backstreet Boys
  album)|This Is Us]]
* P.D.A. (We Just Don't Care), a song by John Legend

In 'politics':
* Alternative Democratic Pole, a political party in Colombia (Polo Democrático
  Alternativo)
* Progressive Democratic Alliance, a past political party in British
  Columbia, Canada
* Progressive Democrats of America, a faction of the Democratic Party in the
  United States
* Party of Democratic Action, a Bosniak party in Bosnia-Herzegovina
* Aruban Democratic Party, an Aruban political party (Partido
  Democrático Arubano)

'Organizations':
* Parenteral Drug Association, global provider of science, technology and
  regulatory information and education for the pharmaceutical and
  biopharmaceutical community
* Pharmacists' Defence Association, membership organization for pharmacists
  registered within the United Kingdom
* Peruvian Debate Association, organization in charge of inter-school debating
  in Peru. Holds the Semestral PDA Debate Competition twice every year
* Pinoy Dream Academy, the Philippine franchise of Endemol's Star Academy
* Population and Community Development Association, a non-governmental
  organization based in Thailand

'Other uses':
* "PDA" (''The Office''), an episode from the 7th season of the U.S. version of
  ''The Office
* "PDA", an episode of the Adult Swim animated television series, [[Aqua Teen
  Hunger Force]]
* [[Past Doctor Adventures]], a series of spin-off novels based on the long
  running BBC science fiction television series Doctor Who
* Public development authority, a type of government-owned corporation
  established by the laws of the U.S. state of Washington
* Private defense agency
* Pub Design Awards
* Public display of affection
* Professional Development Award, an academic qualification offered by the
  Scottish Qualification Authority.
wiki.title: PDA%20%28disambiguation%29
